title: Llewellyn Manor Murder Mystery
story_line: You are suspected of the murder of wealthy businessman, Mr. Jameson Halloway, after being the first to find the body. The local constable has the mansion on lockdown. You must clear your name and find the real culprit if you want to escape. Navigate through the various rooms of the Llewellyn Manor to meet the suspects and uncover clues. Click on the characters and objects to get a closer look or ask any questions you might have.
